name: Over Yonder
description:
Made for Mini Jam 124. The theme was warmth and the limitation was "Your score serves a purpose."

You and your 3 friends went on a camping trip. But then they all wandered off and got lost in the forest. Now you have to find them without freezing to death in the cold night.

-Your fire provides warmth

-Feed your fire to increase its area of warmth (represented by your score)

-Walk near a resource and press "E" to collect it

-If it gets too cold (below -30°C), you will begin to freeze

-Find all 3 of your friends and uncover the spooky secrets hidden in the forest

-Use number keys 1-4 to change inventory slots

Sometimes when you go into fullscreen you won't be able to use the arrow keys to move. Click anywhere to fix that.
